product_name: Bending Branches Sun Shadow ST Paddle
long_description: The Sun Shadow ST paddle is the lightest straight shaft from Bending Branches! This exotic beauty has a narrow, ovalized shaft and an ergonomically designed grip that fits hands comfortably. Powerful, efficient 11-laminate blade features butternut, basswood, black willow and alder, increasing stiffness and width. Wrap Around(TM) Rockgard(R) protects the blade tip, wrapping up around the corners onto the blade edges. Ergonomically designed contour grip allows hours of paddling comfort.
short_description: The Sun Shadow ST paddle is the lightest straight shaft from Bending Branches! This exotic beauty has a narrow, ovalized shaft and an ergonomically designed grip that fits hands comfortably.
